thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 20 of 235
thread.title: Tracy

author: Tracy
title: Tracy
text: I check for deals daily. I have loved 95% of what I've purchased. I tell everyone about Groupon and if I know someone is looking for a particular item, I show it to them on Groupon. I buy anything from electronics to jewelry to clothing to getaways. You name it, if the deal is right, I will buy it. Customer service is great as well. They've always assisted me in my issues/concerns.
